page.title: 03Railways
page.content: Railways In Coatbridge there are three railway stations.{Coatbridge Central,Blairhill {station}and{Sunnyside station. Coatbridge Central is now unstaffed but it is still used.You can get your ticket from the travel agent and get on the train at the staion and hand in your ticket at the other end.Me and my pals look after it and clean it up. Blairhill station is part of {Strathclyde Transport.}Trains stop at it.It is painted bright orange. Sunnyside station is{British Rail.}It is quite an old station and a well looked after one.It is a dull grey paint.All the stations in Coatbridge are looked after well except Coatbridge Central which is allways getting vandlised. The vandals smash windows and spray them with spray paint.
